metadata.title: Friday, 23rd November, 2012
metadata.session: SECOND SESSION OF THE ELEVENTH ASSEMBLY

parts: (a)    what circumstances led to the death of a Zambian national whose body was found floating in a river in Czech Republic on 6th November, 2012 as reported in the local media; and
(b)    whether the Zambian Government will institute an independent inquiry to ascertain the cause of the death.
(a)    how many Rwandese nationals were resident in Zambia as of August, 2012;
(b)    of the Rwandese nationals at (a), how many were wanted in their country as suspects of the genocide that took place in 1994;
(c)    whether the Zambian Government will hand-over the suspects to the Rwandese Government in order for them to stand trial in accordance with the Rwandese and international laws; and

(d)    if so, when the suspects will be handed over. ORDER OF THE DAY 1    Estimates of Revenue and Expenditure (Including Capital and Constitutional and Statutory Expenditure): Committee of Supply: Resumption of Debate: (Head 29/05: under consideration). Heads 29/06, 29/07, 29/08, 29/09, 34/01, 26/01, 26/02, 26/03, 46/01, 46/02, 46/06, 46/07, 46/08, 46/09, 46/10, 46/11, 46/12, 46/13, 46/14, 46/15, 46/16, 46/17, 46/18, 46/19, 21/01, 37/01, 37/02, 37/04, 37/06, 37/07, 37/08, 37/09, 37/10, 37/11, 37/12, 37/13 and 37/14 - for consideration. KEY TO HEADS OF EXPENDITURE Head 29    -    Ministry of Local Government and Housing Head 34    -    Human Rights Commission Head 26    -    Ministry of Information and Broadcasting Head 46    -    Ministry of Health Head 21    -    Loans and Investments – Ministry of Finance Head 37    -    Ministry of Finance
